printed for J. Eaglesfield, at the Marigold over against the Globe-Tavern in Fleet-Street, London : 1686.
Caption title on pg. 1: A collection of moral maxims and reflections. Title page preceeded by an advertisment page. Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
